file.name: get_with_multiple_path_param.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.3
info:
  title: Entities
  version: "1.0"
paths:
  /person/{personId}/{personName}:
    get:
      summary: Find person by ID
      description: Returns a single person
      operationId: getPersonByIdAndName
      parameters:
        - name: personId
          in: path
          description: ID of person to return
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
        - name: personName
          in: path
          description: Name of person to return
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: successful operation

Error: parse: parse spec: parse path items: path "/person/{personId}/{personName}": get: operation "getPersonByIdAndName": parameters: parse parameter "personName": at core/src/test/resources/api/uri/get_with_multiple_path_param.yaml:21:21: path parameters must be required
